name: Some_doodle_prototype
description:
Yeah, there is my little project which I wanted to make for one of gamejams but was incredibly bisy with Rocket dodger.

     My intention is to make little adventure game with narration like in Undertale or smthn.

     So here is little prototype where you have a girl and pots. Also she holds very sharp and durable knife with which you can break all pots in your sight. Pots will break with nice sound. There is no audio settings, so be careful.

     Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - movement
  • Space - attack with a knife (or interact in the future)
  • F10 - scroll between color modes
  • F5 - restart level

     Hope I'll end this project and make full game out of it.
